DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study see whether people restrict number calorie eat long period time , compare normal-eating obese people , marker cellular age look young .
DOC.brief_title: Long-term Caloric Restriction Cellular Aging Markers
DOC.criteria: Calorie restrict group : Selfreported caloric restriction least two year Calorie restriction group : BMI 23 Normal eat control : Normal eating ( history caloric restriction ) two year Normal eating control : BMI 30 Obese comparison group : BMI 30 Obese comparison group : Normal eating ( history caloric restriction ) two year Regular smoker past six month
